SC parents, students brace for coronavirus impact, raise school cancellation concerns
While no public schools in South Carolina have closed so far, some parents fear that not enough is being done to manage the spread of the virus proactively. As of Thursday afternoon, there were 10 cases of the coronavirus reported in South Carolina. Two have been confirmed by the federal Centers for Disease Control. In order to address the ...

New Harmony High School in New Orleans closing early Thursday over coronavirus concerns
New Harmony High, a school in Mid-City New Orleans, announced late Thursday morning that officials would be "releasing students immediately" due to a "potential off campus exposure" of the novel coronavirus.

Denver Public Schools will excuse absences of children kept home as coronavirus continues to spread
RELATED: Have you been affected by the coronavirus in Colorado? We want to hear from you. On Thursday, Denver’s Edison Elementary School was closed for the day after a parent tested positive for COVID-19, the respiratory disease caused by the new coronavirus, and Cory Elementary was closed for a second day for the same reason. Stratford coronavirus case confirmed, schools closed as of Friday
STRATFORD — The town’s public schools will be closed effective Friday after the state Health Department confirmed a positive case of coronavirus COVID-19 in Stratford, officials said Thursday. Schools Superintendent Janet Robinson sent a message out Thursday morning saying public schools in town will be closed effective Friday, March 13 ...

In light of continued Coronavirus monitoring, Dayton-area public schools have taken extra precautions for students' health and well being, with some beginning preparations for potential school closings.

... have cautioned that there is not yet enough evidence to know that closing schools will prevent the spread of the coronavirus. If schools close ahead of a presumed positive test, they would also need to stay closed after one, which creates the possibility of a month-long closure. Districts this week have been developing plans for as long as ...

Orleans Parish School Board declares emergency over coronavirus as schools cancel gatherings
The Orleans Parish School Board on Thursday unanimously passed a state of local emergency for the city's collection of public schools as many institutions, public and private, starting announcing cancellation of field trips and other large-scale events over coronavirus concerns.

Denver’s Edison Elementary School closes Thursday after parent tests positive for coronavirus
Edison Elementary School in Denver is closed Thursday after a parent of a child in the school tested positive for the new coronavirus, Denver Public Schools announced. The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has been notified, the district said, and is determining who the parent had contact with and testing the patient’s ...

Chesterfield County schools are closed to students on Friday, the school division announced Thursday morning in response to the spread of the coronavirus in Virginia. is seeking food and monetary donations in case the schools close because of coronavirus. “Camella’s Cupboard is indeed gearing up for the potential of feeding a large number of students if there is a school closure,” said Angela Chastain who created and oversees the program and also chairs the school board. Ireland school closures reveal stark contrast to UK Covid-19 response
Northern Ireland on Thursday recorded two new cases, bringing its total to 20. The prospect of diverging strategies on school closures prompted criticism that authorities were acting as if coronavirus would respect the 310-mile border between the north and south of Ireland. Northern Ireland’s health minister, Robin Swann, told Stormont’s ...

From schools to nursing homes, a scramble to stop coronavirus
Large gatherings are banned in parts of Washington, schools are closed in Seattle, and nursing homes across the U.S. are on high alert as coronavirus cases continue to rise. Zachary Goelman has this report.

Dearborn Public Schools temporarily closed Whitmore Bolles Elementary School after a staff member came in contact with someone with a confirmed case of coronavirus COVID-19, the district announced Wednesday. The Laboratory School of Finance and Technology and South Bronx Preparatory: A College Board School are both located in the same building at 360 East 145th Street. The Whitehall-Coplay School District is closed for “disinfecting and deep cleaning,” according to a text alert and Facebook post. The district did not indicate there was any coronavirus exposure.

Meanwhile, Delhi on Thursday recorded the sixth positive case in the national capital. The patient is the mother of a 46-year-old man ...

was closed to all staff and students Wednesday, but classes will resume Thursday. "We'll be glad to welcome our students back to campus today,"and they'll get an exceptionally clean and santitized environment," a spokesperson told WRAL. At least three private schools in Raleigh say families have been quarantined during the coronavirus outbreak.
